LanguageData.OE_Chemical_Timbium.label: timbium addiction
LanguageData.OE_Chemical_Timbium.description: Because of an timbium addiction, this person needs to regularly consume timbium to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
LanguageData.OE_Chemical_Garganadol.label: garganadol addiction
LanguageData.OE_Chemical_Garganadol.description:
This person's body is enhanced by garganadol mechanites.

Without regular doses of garganadol, the mechanites will lose cohesion. If this happens, the user eventually dies.

This addiction never goes away.
